Package icyllis.modernui.widget

Interface CoordinatorLayout.AttachedBehavior

Enclosing class:
CoordinatorLayout
public static interface CoordinatorLayout.AttachedBehavior
Defines the default attached CoordinatorLayout.Behavior of a View class

When writing a custom view, implement this interface to return the default behavior when used as a direct child of an CoordinatorLayout. The default behavior can be overridden using CoordinatorLayout.LayoutParams.setBehavior(icyllis.modernui.widget.CoordinatorLayout.Behavior<?>).

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    CoordinatorLayout.Behavior<?>
    getBehavior()
    Returns the behavior associated with the matching View class.
